snippet: The rules will allow American companies to open locations in Cuba and will clarify how they can conduct transactions and finance operations there.
abstract: Obama administration will significantly ease restrictions on Americans doing business in Cuba; loosening of regulations on travel, commerce and investment follows last year's agreement between two countries to normalize relations.
lead_paragraph: The rules will allow American companies to open locations in Cuba and will clarify how they can conduct transactions and finance operations there.

headline.main: U.S. to Announce Loosening of Business and Travel Restrictions on Cuba
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Announce Loosening of Business and Travel Restrictions on Cuba
